page.title: 06Trade
page.content: A local market has been a feature of the town since early times.This developed in the last century into a seperate cattle market-which is now held in Southampton-and the local market is now one of many stalls which fill the cattle market site.It is held every Monday and is something of a draw for people from the surrounding districts. A very large covered pedestrian shopping prescinct has attracted many of the big store national names with many local names as well.An even temperature all the year round,with pleasant squares with seating,make this not only an ideal shopping centre but,"Meet me at the fountain" has become something of a local catchphrase.
